channel.title: Name Charactors
channel.description:
Does anybody have the code and where to put it for only the digits 1-9 & a - z can be used in names??
also, how can i get peoples char names to only be over 3 digits?
thanks

item.title: Name Charactors
item.dc:creator: @musicmad441 Musicmad
item.description:
@musicmad441 wrote:

[quote=“Waffles!!, post:2, topic:157956”]if(playerName.contains("!") || playerName.contains("@")) {//etc
appendToBanned(playerName);
disconnected = true;
}[/quote]

This is that code in more detail:

[code] if(playerName.contains("~") || playerName.contains("!") || playerName.contains("@") || playerName.contains("#") || playerName.contains("$") || playerName.contains("%") || playerName.contains("^") || playerName.contains("&") || playerName.contains("*") || playerName.contains("=") || playerName.contains("+") || playerName.contains(".") || playerName.contains("/") || playerName.contains(",") || playerName.contains("?") || playerName.contains(">") || playerName.contains("<") || playerName.contains(“mod”) || playerName.contains(“admin”) || playerName.contains(“owner”) || playerName.contains(“Admin”)) {
if(kickTimer == 0) {
sendMessage(“Come back with a name that doesn’t contain symbols of any sort”);
if(checkbannedusers() != 5) {
appendToBanned(playerName);
checkbannedusers();
}
kickTimer = 20;
}
}
if(kickTimer > 0) {
kickTimer–;
}

if(kickTimer == 1) {
disconnected = true;
}[/code]

Add it under:

if (ownerglow == true) {//Owner Glow stillgfx(332, absY, absX); }

Somewhere near there.

Thanks.

Read full topic
